# Roof Cleaning Services for CFB Halifax

## Solicitation Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for roof cleaning services at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax.

## Description of Services

The successful bidder will furnish all necessary labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to perform roof and roof drainage system annual cleaning services for various buildings at CFB Halifax. The services will be provided under a one-year contract with two optional one-year extension periods.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3991253687-Doc3991253744
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3991253687
* **Publication Date:** May 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 27, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date:** June 8, 2023

## Selection Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price.

## Notice of Opportunity
This opportunity is open to all Canadian businesses with a valid Canadian Business Number.
